1.
x30 = x5 + x6
    = 0x8000_0000_0000_0000 + 0xD000_0000_0000_0000
    = 0x5000_0000_0000_0000

2.
overflow

3.
x30 = x5 - x6 = x5 + (-x6)
(-x6) = 0x3000_0000_0000_0000
x30 = 0xB000_0000_0000_0000

4.
desired result

5.
add x30, x5, x6
x30 = 0x5000_0000_0000_0000
add x30, x30, x5
x30 = 0x5000_0000_0000_0000 + 0x8000_0000_0000_0000
    = 0xD000_0000_0000_0000

6.
overflow
